author: Ruchi Kejriwal
text: 'Good food! First time ever that I finished my whole brunch plate. Got the ricotta toast (I am a vegetarian) and it was yummy! Liked the service as well. Sat outside in October and the location is really perfect for brunch.'

text: 'Allnfood are delicious and up to taste. Friendly & polite staff.'

author: Mike Bender
text: 'Very Good

author: Rosie H
text: "I love this restaurant and the food is delicious!  But my husband and i decided not to go back. We wanted to enjoy an intimate and delicious dinner.  We got a table inside and for the first 5 minutes everything was great.   Until we began to hear the waitresses throwing the dirty dishes in the container. The whole time we were there every 3 minutes we kept hearing the loud noise of the dishes being thrown.  I understand the restaurant was busy and the waitresses  were trying to rush but they need to keep in mind they don't need to throw them and make such a loud noise. People are just trying to enjoy a nice dinner and we couldn't wait to get out of there!!!"

author: YT Piano and more!

author: MJ FC
text: 'The ambience was amazing. The food‚Ä¶..DELICIOUS! But the best part of my experience was the service. Angela was our waitress and she was so sweet and attentive. The manager
column5: Francis - was the same and he ran around the restaurant making sure his staff and the customers were enjoying their time. That is rare to see these days! I will definitely come back.'

author: Lauren Walt
text: 'Could do better'

author: DENISE RELF
text: 'Delicious was good. Nice and fresh. Bread was a bit hard. Service was good.'

author: Caitlin McManus
text: "The food is hands down amazing!! The pasta is so delicious and filling! The consumer service was on the other hand was horrible. Our witness
column5: Diane
column6: either wasn't having a good day or wasn't completely there.\n1. She never introduced herself to us or greeted us (I only know her name from the check). She went straight to getting our drink order.\n2. Like I said
column7: I don't think she was completely there mentally because she wasn't paying attention to our drink order and gave both me and my husband the wrong drink.\n3. We got our meal
column8: thank goodness that was correct; however
column9: both of our cocktails were empty and I wanted to order another drink. She must have past our table 10 times with our empty drinks just sitting there and never once stopped to ask us if we wanted another drink until both of our plates were taken away.\nHer lack of awareness and care just made for a bad experience. I hope her was just having an off day."

author: Jessie Huang

author: Lauren Beloff
text: 'This was our first time eating out in a year! It was absolutely incredible! The service was fantastic. The food delicious. The waitstaff was patient and polite. The overall experience made a perfect ‚Äúfirst night out since being vaccinated‚Äù dinner!!!\n\nWe decided to try Margherita‚Äôs as we had both never been. We did not make reservations but they were incredibly nice to seat us right away. Our waitress was really sweet and let us check out the menu on our phones while she brought over bread
column5: olive oil
column6:
and Parmesan cheese. Their olive oil is the BEST!!!!!!! Also the fresh mozzarella is AMAZING!!!

I am Gluten Free and the waitress was SO amazing and careful with my order. I ordered an arugula salad with grilled chicken which was perfection. The chicken was so juicy and seasoned perfectly!!
My boyfriend got Penne Vodka with Chicken. He said the pasta was so fresh tasting and the sauce was really delicious!!! The food came out hot. I really loved that no one rushed us to eat.

We met the lovely and so incredibly kind owners Matt and Nicole. They came over to say hello which I loved!!! They are the NICEST and most down to earth people. That‚Äôs the BEST part about small businesses in Hoboken you get to meet the people who put their heart and soul into it.
We will definitely be back!!üòÄ'

author: Julia Kee
text: "Delicious (and very filling food). Pizzas are personal pizzas
column5: but only if you don't fill up on apps and bread ahead of time! BYOB. Outdoor dining as of April 2021. Slightly slow service but overall a great experience and looking forward to returning soon"

text: 'Great pizza.'

author: Hee Cho (Haley)
text:
'I ordered delivery for seafood Margherita and vodka sauce penne pasta with shrimp. This place is perfect when you want to just wear pajamas and do pasta and wine party. (You get to enjoy the pasta purely - I felt like I was Julia Roberts from Eat Pray Love)

Seafood Margherita was superb. The linguine was homemade and chewy. Tomato sauce was thick and amazing. This will definitely be my go to menu if I order from this place again.

Vodka sauce penne pasta was good but I think I got into thick seafood Margherita‚Äôs tomato sauce more. I added shrimps with a little bit of doubt and worries because most restaurants give you small shrimps. But this one came with prawn like shrimps and it went well with penne pasta.

I gave 5 stars but beware the pasta portion is huge and they mostly pair with wine so well you will end up drinking up your wine too much.

I will order homemade tiramisu and cheese pizza for pajama wine movie night.

Stay safe :)'

author: Carissa Zito
text: 'Very cute Italian restaurant. The Bologna was very good! The shrimp fra Diablo could have been a bit more flavorful but I still enjoyed it. It‚Äôs byob but they also have a full drink menu'

text: 'I ordered mussels from this restaurant and the hostess called me and told me they were out of mussels and that they would process me a refund.  This was on 7/24/2020 and after 4 phone calls

author: Steven Guzman
text:
"Beautiful Outdoor Seating and The Food and Service was tremendous. I had the Chilean Seabass and my girlfriend had the Shrimp & Lobster Scampi. Both were excellent.

Can't wait to come back and try the Lobster Ravioli & Sausage Orecchiette.

Definitely ask for the Daily Special."

author: Eric Hammer
text: "I've been to Margherita's twice. The first was a takeout order; there was limited interaction with Staff
column5: but the food was good and the whole process was seamless.\n\nThe second was during their first weekend back after a long hiatus due to renovations. Though they weren't taking reservations
column6: I was able to put my name down on the wait list. Even better
column7: when I was texted that my table was ready
column8: I asked to be pushed down the list because I wasn't quite ready. They were very accommodating.\n\nThe staff during dinner
column10: were not as courteous. We felt rushed from the moment we sat down. Our waitress was seemingly in a hurry to take our order
column11: and a nearby table of friends had expressed the same overbearing urgency.\n\nDespite the service being a bit of a nuisance
column12: the food was excellent. The baked clams appetizer was awesome. The chicken parm was delicious
column13: and the portion was huge. The fussili with broccoli rabe and sausage was outstanding.\n\nIf you're looking for a really good meal
column14: look no further. In regards to the service
column15: I'll give them the benefit of the doubt and attribute the over-urgency to the Staff working out their kinks during a grand reopening. Hoping they're around for a while
column16: and I'm looking forward to getting here again."

author: Michael Bloomberg
text: 'My favorite restaurant in Hoboken.  Food is always fresh and delicious and friendly staff.'

column6: courteous and friendly service.'

author: Johnny O
text: "We always get full trays of chicken cutlet over penne with the tomato cream sauce. And a half tray of garlic bread. They always take care of us and it is a workplace favorite. We sometimes order the pizza
column5: which is really good but not very often. We know what we like and we stick to it. I've never eaten at the restaurant though."

author: Mary
text: 'This place is BYOB'

author: David Horowitz
text: "This is one of my favorite restaurants. Every pasta dish I've had here has been amazing. Their chicken francese special is to die for. Nice atmosphere
column5: kind staff
column6: amazing food and plentiful parmesan cheese make for a great dining experience."

author: Erin Carrather
text: 'Great dishes & equally good pizza.'

author: David Tse
text: 'Large portions
column5: delicious food
column6: at a reasonable price!'

author: Joseph Hoppe
text: 'The wait can be long on the weekends. But the chicken parm and the specials are awesome.'

author: Nathan Turoff
text: 'Simple fare in a friendly
column5: old-Hoboken setting. Good pastas
column6: great deserts.'

author: Zhen Yang
text: 'What a surprise! Great bakery! Nice coffee! Friendly price!'

author: Robert Sokolov
text: 'Great authentic Italian food. Giant portions and reasonable prices. Family owned since 1993!'

author: Don McCarty
text: 'Always tasty
column5: never disappoints. Usually a wait so just be ready. Worth it. Used to let you wait across the street in the bar.'

author: Ashley Sotomayor Alvarez
text: "I really always enjoy the food
column5: it's always delicious!"

author: Andre Cotto (Trustdre)
text: 'Great food
column5: great service.  Never disappointed with food a very cozy and romantic place to eat.'

author: Katie Welnhofer
text: 'Great service
column5: and delicious homemade pasta.  Went right at 5PM and it was already starting to get crowded. BYOB is nice as well. Would go back!'

author: Sand Me
text: 'Delish dishes with attentive staff.. Kudos Margherita'

author: Dillon Wu
text: 'One of the best plates of pasta in Hoboken!'

author: Paul Cox III
text: 'Best Italian in Hoboken'

author: Mark M
text: 'Great atmosphere and food'

author: Glenn Coogan
text: 'Always a great meal'

author: Debi Buzunis
text: 'Always a crowd but the staff make it fun. Food is wonderful'

author: Purvin Patel
text:
'(Translated by Google) The penne arebiatta is amazing

(Original)
The penne arebiatta is amazing'

author: Greg Mercado
text: 'Pasta and pizza. Large portions and delicious food.'

author: Noah King
text: 'Pretty good but not amazing food
column5: but big portions for cheep. They also have a wide selection of interesting sodas.'

author: Elizabeth Lamb
text: 'Authentic down to the family portraits on the walls.'

author: Noah Mustafa
text: 'Mom and Pop feeling. Home cooked meals done with detail. Very tasty food and lovely hostess. Get crowded sometimes so be early'

author: gaurav gupta
text: 'Great pasta'

author: David Silver
text: 'Had a nice meal\nGood Pizza\nConveniently Located'

author: Barry Travis
text: 'Brick oven pies.'

author: Mehrdad Nosrati
text: 'Their food portion size is really huge. I like their pizza.'

author: Hart Welles
text: 'Loved the BYOB aspect and the Fetucini Alfredo'

author: Joseph Tiseo
text: 'Good classic Italian restaurant.'

author: Jim Hughes
text: "Heaven! I've never been disappointed. I just posted a picture of the Margherita with Pesto Sauce. My kitchen smells like love! ‚ù§Ô∏è"

author: Ananya Gupta
text: 'Generous portions of food. The pizzas are a bit tiny considering they only have individual portion options and the food in general seemed average. The service is also average and the staff are not very accommodating.'

author: Jim Mannoia
text: 'Great pasta....homemade....made picata not on the menu for my son!!!'

author: Ronald Magnusson
text: 'Our go to place for a dish of pasta'

author: Tyler
text: 'The staff is really nice and the food is pretty good
column5: but it is not worth the price.\n\nThe restaurant tries to give off the air of fanciness
column6: but then fails when food comes out too early

author: Kathryn Warburton
text: "this is a really popular place
column5: and i think it's because of the great service.  the staff is so friendly.  the food is quite good
column6: but a little inconsistant."

author: John Veltri
text: "they might have the best pasta this side of italy
column5: and it's even better out of the fridge the following day.  free bruscetta
column6: home made pasta
column7: and great portions.  anything else needed?"

author: Ken Boyar
text: "IF YOU CAN STAND THE OBNOXIOUS WAIT
column5: YOU'LL BE TREATED TO EXCELLENT ITALIAN FOOD
column6: LARGE PORTIONS AND REASONABLE PRICES."
